faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our solar solutions

q1.question: What services do you offer?
q1.answer: We provide complete solar panel installation services including initial consultation, system design and sizing, all paperwork and permit handling, professional installation, and ongoing maintenance support. We handle everything from start to finish.

q2.question: How long does it take to recoup the investment?
q2.answer: The return on investment typically ranges from 6-10 years depending on your energy consumption, system size, and available government incentives. After the payback period, you'll enjoy decades of free, clean energy.

q3.question: What warranties do you provide?
q3.answer: Our solar panels come with 25-year performance warranties, and inverters have 10-15 year warranties. We also provide workmanship guarantees on all installations to ensure your system operates optimally.

q4.question: How does the installation process work?
q4.answer: After an initial consultation and site assessment, we design a custom system for your needs. Once approved, we handle all permits and paperwork. Installation typically takes 1-3 days, followed by inspection and grid connection.

q5.question: Does the system need maintenance?
q5.answer: Solar panels require minimal maintenance. We recommend annual inspections and occasional cleaning. Our maintenance packages ensure your system continues to perform at its best throughout its lifetime.

q6.question: Are there government incentives?
q6.answer: Yes, various government incentives and rebates are available for solar installations. We help you navigate all available programs to maximize your savings and make solar more affordable.

overview.title: High-Efficiency Solar Solutions

batteryStorage.subtitle: Store solar energy for 24/7 power independence and backup protection

overview.title: Energy Independence
overview.description: Battery storage systems allow you to store excess solar energy produced during the day for use at night or during power outages. Achieve true energy independence while maximizing your solar investment and protecting your home from grid disruptions.
overview.description2: Modern lithium-ion battery technology provides reliable, efficient energy storage with long lifespan and minimal maintenance requirements.

hero.title: How We Work
hero.subtitle: A proven 6-step process that ensures your solar project is completed on time, on budget, and to your complete satisfaction

overview.title: Our Commitment to Excellence
overview.description: From initial consultation to long-term support, we're with you every step of the way. Our transparent process ensures you know exactly what to expect at each stage.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We begin with a comprehensive discussion of your energy goals, property assessment, and budget. Our experts analyze your electricity usage, roof condition, and available space to recommend the optimal solution.

step2.title: Site Survey & Design
step2.description: Our technical team conducts a detailed on-site evaluation using advanced tools. We create a custom system design optimized for your property's unique characteristics and energy needs.
step2.deliverables: 3D system design, energy production estimates, detailed quote

step3.title: Financing & Permitting
step3.description: We help you explore financing options and handle all necessary permits and approvals. Our team navigates the bureaucracy so you don't have to, ensuring compliance with local regulations and utility requirements.
step3.deliverables: Approved permits, signed contract, financing arrangement

step4.title: Installation
step4.description: Our certified installers execute the project with precision and care. We complete electrical work, mounting, wiring, and inverter installation while minimizing disruption to your daily routine.
step4.deliverables: Fully installed system, electrical inspection approval

step5.title: Inspection & Activation
step5.description: We coordinate final inspections with local authorities and utility companies. Once approved, we activate your system and ensure everything is operating at peak performance.
step5.deliverables: System activation, utility interconnection, monitoring setup

step6.title: Monitoring & Support
step6.description: Your relationship with us doesn't end at installation. We provide ongoing monitoring, maintenance support, and are always available to answer questions or address concerns.

point1.title: Transparent Pricing
point1.description: No hidden fees or surprise costs

point2.title: Quality Materials
point2.description: Only Tier-1 components with full warranties

point4.title: Fast Installation
point4.description: Most projects completed in under a week

point6.title: Ongoing Support
point6.description: Lifetime customer support and system monitoring

reason1.title: 1000+ Successful Projects
reason1.description: We've completed installations for homes and businesses across Central Europe

reason2.title: Average 4.9/5 Customer Rating
reason2.description: Our customers consistently praise our professionalism and quality

reason3.title: Fastest Installation Times
reason3.description: We respect your time and complete projects efficiently without compromising quality

reason4.title: Comprehensive Warranties
reason4.description: Industry-leading coverage on equipment and workmanship for your peace of mind

hero.title: Government Support & Incentives
hero.subtitle: Take advantage of generous subsidies and tax benefits to make solar energy more affordable

highlight.title: Solar Panel Installation Subsidy
highlight.description: The Hungarian government offers substantial support for residential and commercial solar installations. Eligible applicants can receive up to 50% of installation costs, making solar energy more accessible than ever.

program1.title: Residential Solar Subsidy
program1.description: Direct grant for homeowners installing solar panels. Covers up to 50% of system costs including panels, inverters, and installation labor.

program2.title: Battery Storage Incentive
program2.description: Additional support for installing battery storage systems alongside solar panels. Encourages energy independence and grid stability.

program3.title: EV Charger Grant
program3.description: Subsidy for installing electric vehicle charging stations at home or business. Supports the transition to electric mobility.

program4.title: Commercial Energy Efficiency
program4.description: Support for businesses implementing renewable energy and efficiency upgrades. Larger projects can access more substantial funding.

program5.title: Tax Incentives
program5.description: Accelerated depreciation and VAT benefits for solar installations. Reduces tax burden for businesses and qualifying properties.

program6.title: Low-Interest Green Loans
program6.description: Government-backed financing with preferential interest rates for renewable energy projects. Makes upfront costs more manageable.

category1.title: For Homeowners
category1.requirement1: Property owner or have written permission

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.description: We handle the entire application process for you, ensuring maximum benefits and minimal hassle.

step1.title: Contact Us for Assessment
step1.description: Schedule a free consultation where we evaluate your eligibility and potential subsidy amount

step2.title: We Prepare Your Application
step2.description: Our team gathers all required documentation and completes the subsidy application on your behalf

step3.title: Application Submission
step3.description: We submit your application to the relevant government agency and track its progress

step4.title: Approval & Installation
step4.description: Once approved, we proceed with installation. The subsidy is typically paid after project completion

step5.title: Subsidy Receipt
step5.description: After final inspection, the government subsidy is transferred directly to your account or applied to your invoice

cta.title: Maximize Your Savings
cta.subtitle: Let us help you access every available subsidy and incentive
